reference.title: Create New Table
reference.shortdesc: Defines a new, empty table within an existing database. To access this dialog, switch to the MOTODEV Database perspective. Then, using the MOTODEV Database Explorer, right-click a connected database and select Create Table.

strow.stentry: The name of the SQLite database table to be created.

Adds a new column to the database table. You will be prompted for the column name, type, and an optional default value. You can also indicate whether the column represents a primary key, and, if so, whether the key should be generated automatically.
